title: T213 Type II - McLean / Jennings - Trade

posts.post_title: T213 Type II - McLean / Jennings - Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: J Marie
Looking to trade T213 Type 2 McLean and Jennings for the following:

- T218 graded PSA/SGC 5 or better: Platt Adams, "Johnny" Hayes in USA uniform, Budd Goodwin and Robert Cloughen
- T222 Track and Field
- 1910 National Licorice Track and Field
- C59 C60 and C61 Lacrosse


Here are scans of T213's
